document.full_text: thai and cambodian troops opened a second front in a five-day confrontation that has killed 13 people in southeast asia's bloodiest border dispute in years.
document.title: asia: thailand and cambodia escalate clashes across their border
lines_and_colors: thai and cambodian troops opened a second front in a five-day confrontation that has killed 13 people in southeast asia's bloodiest border dispute in years.
